title: The Benny The Butcher & Rick Hyde Interview: Getting Shot, G Herbo, Bidding War & More
description:
Benny is back on the program with Rick Hyde, to talk about their new music, relationship with Jay-Z, Donda, Buffalo, Lox vs Dipset, No Jumper Patreon and more!

Benny The Butcher:
https://twitter.com/BennyBsf
https://www.instagram.com/getbenny/

Rick Hyde:
https://twitter.com/rickhydebeatz
https://www.instagram.com/prettyricky...
https://www.instagram.com/blacksopran...

Stamps by Eli Mcfly https://www.instagram.com/eli518mcfly/
